root.text: CODING THE TRAITS – Computers in Molecular evolution

An eye opener workshop for students belonging to computer based streams. This workshop enlightens students with the basic idea of all new branches of study that have a high scope under the field. This workshop is to give basic idea of how computers are used in the field of biology and biotechnology. It combines with hands on experience in BIOINFORMATICS LAB at PSG TECH.

text: 9:00 AM - Students should assemble atJ block 3rd floor BIOINFORMATICS LAB
9:15 AM – 10:30 PM - A brief lecture on basics of nucleic acids and central dogma of life
10:45 AM – 12:00 PM - Hands on workshop on the demonstration of central dogma of life
1:30 PM – 2:30 PM - Brief lecture on different modules and domains of Bioinformatics
2:45 PM – 4:00PM - Hands on training on multiple sequence alignment to construct a phylogeny tree and trace the evolutionary evidences
**The above mentioned schedule can be changed based on availability of time**
In case of on spot registration (subjected to availability), the students are requested to bring the exact sum of the mentioned amount for general registration along with the respective workshop fee.
Participants are requested to carry the hard copy of the workshop confirmation receipt.
Participants must have a valid ID card of their respective educational institutions.

root.text: Under any circumstances, the fee will not be refunded.
Fee is exclusive of food and accommodation
In addition to the workshop fee there will be a mandatory KRIYA registration fee of,
